Posts.Title: DIEP FLAP

Posts.Content: I would go ahead and give her the book.  Maybe bookmark a section that you find helpful and/or inspiring and let her know that those words helped or inspired you and you thought they might help her.  Then if she feels like reading more she will.  I don't think it is being "pushy" unless you insist that she read it.  Good luck, I hope she accepts the book in the spirit that it is given and that it helps the family in this difficult time.  (Also, I think I will check the book out myself...thanks)
